title: A  Open-Label, Placebo-Controlled  Study of ULC-345 (TNF inhibitor) in Patients With Parkinson's Disease
officialTitle: A  Open-Label, Placebo-Controlled  Study of ULC-345 (TNF inhibitor) in Patients With Parkinson's Disease
description: This is a  open-label, placebo-controlled  study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of ULC-345 (TNF inhibitor) in patients with Parkinson's Disease. The study will enroll approximately 385 patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults aged 18-61 years
- Confirmed diagnosis of Parkinson's Disease
- ECOG performance status 0-1
- Adequate organ function
- Willing and able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to study drug or excipients
- Pregnant or breastfeeding women
- Participation in another interventional study within 30 days
- Significant cardiovascular disease within past 6 months
- Active or chronic infection requiring systemic treatment
